info.title: ABC Retail Store APIs
info.description: Demonstration API for a fictitious online retailor.

get.summary: Returns the customers list and basic data from the backend system
get.description:
Gets `Customer` objects.
The query param of **size** determines
size of returned array. -1 implies return all records and should be avoided.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records of customers to return

400.description: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax. The client SHOULD NOT repeat the request without modifications

403.description: the resource is unavailable for some reason

404.description: The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI

409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

415.description: Only JSON payloads are valid. Other media types are not supported

429.description: The 429 status code indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

500.description: Unexpected Error, please try again later

505.description: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.

post.summary: Creates a Customer in the ABC store with form data

get.summary: Returns a customer's data from the backend system based on customer id

400.description: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax. The client SHOULD NOT repeat the request without modifications

403.description: the resource is unavailable for some reason

404.description: The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI

409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

415.description: Only JSON payloads are valid. Other media types are not supported

429.description: The 429 status code indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

500.description: Unexpected Error, please try again later

505.description: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.
